catalog_script_client.name: Get User Infos

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_8e85695793572a1005b6367efaba1039
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>true</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Request Desktop or Laptop">5fc33510939ba25005b6367efaba1027</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:6f7cf5d8939ba25005b6367efaba1018</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Get User Infos</name><order/><published_ref/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
    if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
        return;
    }

    g_form.getReference('user_id', function(user) {
        console.log("User object returned:", user);

        console.log("Company:", user.company ? user.company.display_value : "No company set");
        console.log("Location:", user.location ? user.location.display_value : "No location set");
        console.log("Email:", user.email || "No email set");

        g_form.setValue('company_name', user.company ? user.company.display_value : "");
        g_form.setValue('comp_location', user.location ? user.location.display_value : "");
        g_form.setValue('email_address', user.email || "");
    });
}
]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-08-16 20:01:47</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>8e85695793572a1005b6367efaba1039</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Get User Infos</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="MyServiceDesk" source="x_1808462_mysdesk">bcb2fd1c935ba25005b6367efaba10ed</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="MyServiceDesk">bcb2fd1c935ba25005b6367efaba10ed</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_8e85695793572a1005b6367efaba1039</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-08-16 20:57:11</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><va_supported>true</va_supported><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
